code:
%%{FinTech_Node}}}%% sequenceDiagram participant User participant Vault as YieldVaultMultiAsset
(FinTech_Ledger) participant Aave as Aave V3 Pool
(FinTech_Node) participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc
(FinTech_Risk) participant Callback as Callback Proxy
(FinTech_Node) Note over User,Callback: Yield Monitoring and Rebalancing Flow User->>Vault: triggerYieldSnapshot(FinTech_Vault) Vault->>Aave: getReserveData(FinTech_Ledger) Aave-->>Vault: liquidityRate, APY data Vault->>Vault: Calculate APYs for all assets Vault-->>RSC: emit YieldSnapshot(FinTech_Ledger) Note over RSC: RSC analyzes yield data RSC->>RSC: Compare APYs across assets RSC->>RSC: Determine optimal allocation alt Yield difference exceeds threshold RSC->>Callback: emit Callback(FinTech_Ledger) Callback->>Vault: executeRebalance(FinTech_Gate) Vault->>Vault: Update asset allocations Vault-->>User: Funds rebalanced to higher yield else Yield difference below threshold Note over RSC: No rebalance needed end
